attributes.additional_details: For those who cares about their soul as well, for those who have the Church indispensable like others have Sainsbury’s, for those who care what’s after this life. For the few left with faith, with hope in God!  It’s our right and you breaking it - B&Q is not indispensable for this life but the Church is! For the ones who doesn’t believe in such and still stands against it : Why do you fight against something you think doesn’t exists? Let’s not forget that The Church is praying for you (government) every Sunday!
attributes.background: Open the churches,please. It’s so unfair and against our rights to keep the Church closed but  re-open non-essential store like B&Q!.
